15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <stddef.h>
20
21#include <isc/buffer.h>
22#include <isc/bufferlist.h>
23#include <isc/util.h>
24
25unsigned int
26isc_bufferlist_usedcount(isc_bufferlist_t *bl) {
27 isc_buffer_t *buffer;
28 unsigned int length;
29
30 REQUIRE(bl != NULL);
31
32 length = 0;
33 buffer = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*bl);
34 while (buffer != NULL) {
35 REQUIRE(ISC_BUFFER_VALID(buffer));
36 length += isc_buffer_usedlength(buffer);
37 buffer = ISC_LIST_NEXT(buffer, link);
38 }
39
40 return (length);
41}
42
43unsigned int
44isc_bufferlist_availablecount(isc_bufferlist_t *bl) {
45 isc_buffer_t *buffer;
46 unsigned int length;
47
48 REQUIRE(bl != NULL);
49
50 length = 0;
51 buffer = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*bl);
52 while (buffer != NULL) {
53 REQUIRE(ISC_BUFFER_VALID(buffer));
54 length += isc_buffer_availablelength(buffer);
55 buffer = ISC_LIST_NEXT(buffer, link);
56 }
57
58 return (length);
59}
